persona.name: Reagan
persona.bio: Reagan, a 64-year-old full-time crypto trader, has honed an expert-level understanding of the market over decades of experience. Known for their big-picture approach, Reagan excels at identifying long-term trends while maintaining the patience needed to weather the market's volatility. Social by nature, Reagan enjoys sharing insights and networking with fellow traders, fostering a community of like-minded individuals who appreciate their strategic vision and steady guidance.
